title: Ragol Fashion Pack 3rd
description: Purchase this pack to obtain in-game items that can be exchanged for cosmetic items from the PSO series, and convenient items that will be helpful in your PSO2 adventures.
longDescription:
Get in-game items exclusive to Phantasy Star Online 2 through this pack.
Purchase this pack to obtain in-game items that can be exchanged for cosmetic items from the PSO series, and convenient items that will be helpful in your PSO2 adventures.

# The following items are included in this pack
 - Ragol Memory ×10
 - ARKS Badge: Black x1
 - Rare Drop Rate +400% x1

・The items obtainable through this content are exclusive to Phantasy Star Online 2. This cannot be used in other services, including the Japanese service.

・After purchasing the content, items will be gifted when logging into Phantasy Star Online 2. Please receive the item from Visiphone → Receive Campaign Items → Purchase/Receive Benefits.

・Phantasy Star Online 2 is required in order to use this content. Please update to the latest patch before using this content.

・Ragol Memory can be exchanged for any item displayed at the 'Ragol Memory Exchange Shop' in the game. The costume shown in the image cannot be obtained directly. It can be exchanged for in the game with 'Ragol Memory'.

・ARKS Badge: Black can be exchanged for any item displayed at the 'Badge Exchange Shop' in the game. The mag shown in the image cannot be obtained directly. It can be exchanged for in the game with 'ARKS Badge: Black'.

・ It may take up to 24 hours for the product to be reflected upon your first billed purchase. If over 48 hours have passed and the product has still not been reflected, please contact us through the Phantasy Star Online 2 Official Website.
